variable.name: BIOPSY_ID
variable.description: Identifier to indicate the samples collected from the same biopsy

variable.name: SLICE_ID
variable.description: Identifier to indicate the samples collected from the same slice of the biopsy

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: FMAID
variable.description: Foundational Model of Anatomy ID for the body site where the biopsy is taken from

variable.name: SURGEON
variable.description: Randomly picked code for the surgeon who did the biopsy

variable.name: BIOPSY_COMMENTS
variable.description: Any comments from the surgeon who carried out the biopsy

variable.name: MULTI_LANES?
variable.description: Is the sample sequenced using multiple lanes?

variable.name: MULTI_FLOWCELLS?
variable.description: Is the sample sequenced using multiple flowcells?

variable.name: RNASEQ_GRP
variable.description: ID that groups the samples that were sequenced on the same flowcell

variable.name: OPERATOR
variable.description: Code for the person who operated the sequencer

variable.name: RNASEQ_COMMENTS
variable.description: Additional comments on the sequencing for the sample

variable.name: C1_EXP_ID
variable.description: Unique ID to identify samples that were collected using the same C1 experiment (if applicable)

variable.name: C1_SAMPLE_LOAD
variable.description: Fresh/Frozen nuclei loaded on the C1 chip

variable.name: C1_ADDITIONAL_REAGENTS_ADDED
variable.description: Additional reagents added besides the standard

variable.name: HARVEST_METHOD
variable.description: Method by which cells are harvested

variable.name: SAMPLE_HARVEST_BY
variable.description: Code for the person who harvested the cells

variable.name: cDNA_BY
variable.description: Code for the person who prepared the cDNA

variable.name: LIBRARY_BY
variable.description: Code for the person who prepared the library for sequencing

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL TYPE
variable.description: Specifies the cell class. For instance neuron, cardiomyocyte, brown adipose tissue, etc.

variable.name: CELL_SUBCLASS
variable.description: Specifies the cell sub-class. For instance: pyramidal, 5-HT, interneuron

variable.name: SOURCE_UNIT
variable.description: Unit of source from where the sample material comes from

variable.name: SOURCE_REGION
variable.description: Region of cell from where the input comes from

variable.name: TREATMENT
variable.description: Any special treatment that the cell went through - such as TIVA

variable.name: INPUT_AMOUNT
variable.description: Input amount of RNA that goes in to library preparation

variable.name: BARCODE
variable.description: Unique sequence that is part of the Illumina barcode

variable.name: IS_polyA_SELECTED
variable.description: Does the RNA go through poly(A) selection?
